summary: This is just a simple 2 item clothing recolor done as a personal request. Male outfit version only.
descriptionHtml:
[color=green][size=30]THIS IS JUST A SIMPLE 2 ITEM CLOTHING RECOLOR DONE AS A PERSONAL REQUEST.[/size][/color]
*Male outfit version only.
Location
========
Can be found randomly at Radiant Raiment and other vendors which offer clothing. Items are also craftable.


Install
=======
NMM install

or

Drop ESP and BSA file into your Data Folder and make sure the mod is checked in your plugin list. That will activate it in your game.

Uninstall
=========
NMM Uninstall

or

Uncheck the mod from your plugin list and delete the ESP and BSA files from your Data Folder.


History
=======

1.0, 23014/01/08 - Initial release.

Contact
=======
You can find me on skyrim.nexusmods.com or Steam as JadeRoyale

Licensing/Legal
===============
